content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. To get started, may I please have your name?
Thanks, Martha. Could you please provide your address so I can check our service availability?
I'm not comfortable sharing my full address here. Can we just proceed?
I understand your concern, Martha, but I do need your address to confirm we can schedule a technician to your location. Could you please provide it?
I really don't want to. Is there no other way?
Unfortunately, without your address, we can't confirm service availability or schedule the appointment. If you change your mind, please reach out again. Have a good day!
